CONTENT: しまむらは しまむらだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura is just Shimamura.

CONTENT: 多分ずっと私の中で しまむらなのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En mi corazón, seguramente siempre será Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And she'll always probably just be Shimamura in my heart.

CONTENT: 意味は分からないけど そこに安心感がある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sé por qué, pero estoy tranquila.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't really get it, but there's just a peace of mind.

CONTENT: ふと気が抜ける響きがある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo que a veces te hace bajar la guardia
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Something that just gets my guard down.

CONTENT: それは とてもいいものだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a wonderful thing.

CONTENT: やっぱり今日も来たんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, so you did show up again today.

CONTENT: こちらの方は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And who might this be?

CONTENT: 彼女こそあの しまむらである
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She is the Shimamura.

CONTENT: どの しまむらだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What does that even mean?

CONTENT: ほほう あなたが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oho... So you're...

CONTENT: あーっと お名前は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, uh... What's your name?

CONTENT: フフフ まぬけなドーホーと違って　名前は事前に用意してきました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A diferencia de la tonta de mi compatriota, yo me preparé un nombre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Unlike my foolish compatriot, I have come prepared with a name!

CONTENT: 知我麻社と お呼びください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please call me Yashiro Chikama.

CONTENT: 地球にはドーホーを捜しに来ました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: He venido a la Tierra en busca de mi compañera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've come to Earth in search of my compatriot.

CONTENT: ドーホー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Compatriot...?

CONTENT: ドーホー?　あっ 同胞 仲間のこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Compatriot? Oh, compatriot. Like a friend?

CONTENT: えっ これの仲間?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, there's more of you?

CONTENT: というか今 地球って言った?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or rather, did you just say \"Earth\"?

CONTENT: ドーホーは任務を受けてこの地に降り立ったのですが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi compatriota vino a este planeta con una misión,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My compatriot came to this planet on a mission,

CONTENT: 一向に帰ってきません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero no ha vuelto desde entonces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but they haven't been back ever since.

CONTENT: 仕方なく私が捜しに来たのですが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me ha quedado más remedio que buscarle,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I had no choice but to search for them,

CONTENT: 降りるところを間違えたようです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero se ve que he aterrizado en el sitio erróneo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but it appears that I have landed in the wrong location.

CONTENT: じゃあ しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Alrighty, Shimamura.

CONTENT: そいつと じっくり対話して未知のコミュニケーションを楽しんでくれたまえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ve y disfruta hablando de lo desconocido con ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You go ahead and enjoy talking about the unknown with them.

CONTENT: はあ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?!

CONTENT: おっと あっちに魚影を感じる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aha! I sense some fishies over there!

CONTENT: ちょっと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey!

CONTENT: 日野め　私を釣りに誘ったのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Maldita seas, Hino. Me has invitado para esto...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Curse you, Hino. So the real reason you invited me fishing was...

CONTENT: あなたはしまむらさんというそうですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I hear that your name is Shimamura.

CONTENT: えっ ああ うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Uh... yeah.

CONTENT: 地元の人がこぞって通い詰めるほどの人気者とお聞きしました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: He oído que eres tan famosa que la gente de aquí viene a verte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hear that you're so popular that all the locals come in droves to see you.

CONTENT: そんな しまむらではないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No soy la Shimamura que crees.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, I'm definitely not that Shimamura.

CONTENT: ご謙遜を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, such modesty.

CONTENT: 私は未来からやってきましたので　地元の人間ではありません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo he venido del futuro, así que no soy de aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I have come from the future, so I am not a local.

CONTENT: 念のため
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just so we're clear.

CONTENT: はあ... 私は過去からやってきました どうも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y yo vengo del pasado. Encantada de conocerte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure, and I've come from the past. Nice to meet you.

CONTENT: 典型的な地球人のようですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You seem to be a typical earthling.

CONTENT: そうですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, I guess.

CONTENT: 脱いだら それ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't you take that thing off?

CONTENT: まだ顔ができあがっていないので しばしお待ちを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te pido paciencia, puesto que no tengo la cara preparada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My face is not quite ready, so I do ask for your patience.

CONTENT: パン工場から新しい顔でも届くわけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te van a enviar una cara desde la panadería o qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? Is your face going to be delivered from the bread factory or something?

CONTENT: あんた 友達というか同胞 捜さなくていいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No deberías buscar a tu amiga? O, mejor dicho, ¿a tu compatriota?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shouldn't you be looking for your friend, or rather, your compatriot?

CONTENT: おなかがすきましたので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I'm hungry...

CONTENT: 哲学?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this something philosophical?

CONTENT: ドーホーが無事なこと自体は確認済みなので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya he confirmado que mi compatriota está a salvo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have already confirmed that my compatriot is safe,

CONTENT: のんびりいこうと思います
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que me lo voy a tomar con calma.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I figured I would take it easy.

CONTENT: 連絡とかあったわけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So they contacted you?

CONTENT: まあ 似たようなものです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, something like that.

CONTENT: 連絡取れるならすぐ会えそうなものだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si podéis poneros en contacto, podréis encontraros...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you're able to contact each other, you can probably find each other...

CONTENT: そうもいかない事情がありまして!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And there is a reason that we cannot!

CONTENT: そ... そうなんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I see.

CONTENT: ストン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Plop.

CONTENT: なかなか釣れないもんだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't seem to get a bite.

CONTENT: まず そう思うことが大事なのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es importante que te des cuenta de eso primero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's important that you realize that first...

CONTENT: はあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh-huh...

CONTENT: なかなか釣れない うまくいかない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No pica nada. Las cosas no van según lo previsto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't seem to get a bite. Things aren't going as planned.

CONTENT: それはすなわち何かを始めているということ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Básicamente, significa que algo ha empezado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that basically means that you've started something.

CONTENT: やってみただけかい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You just felt like doing that?

CONTENT: やったぜ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heck yeah!

CONTENT: あとはただよい未来を願って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo único que podemos pedir es que tengamos un futuro brillante
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All we can do from here is wish for a bright future,

CONTENT: 糸を垂らすだけです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and cast our lines.

CONTENT: と まあ そんなことがあった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y eso es lo que pasó.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, yeah... That happened.

CONTENT: どうでもよかった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was I that boring?

CONTENT: そうじゃないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not exactly.

CONTENT: そういう聞き方やめてほしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Could you not say it like that?

CONTENT: ごめん ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry, my bad.

CONTENT: 何か疲れてる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you tired?

CONTENT: まあ 昨日はバイトが忙しくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I was pretty busy at work yesterday.

CONTENT: えっ 安達ってバイトしてるの?　どこで?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, you have a part-time job somewhere? Where?

CONTENT: 教えません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No te lo voy a decir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not telling you.

CONTENT: 何でよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why, though?

CONTENT: 教えたら来そうだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Porque seguro que te plantas allí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because you'd probably show up if I did.

CONTENT: 行くけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, yeah.

CONTENT: やだ 恥ずかしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's embarrassing.

CONTENT: 恥ずかしくないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues que no te la dé.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it's not.

CONTENT: 働いてるのって立派じゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The fact that you're working is admirable.

CONTENT: 安達から猫っぽいと言われたことがある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi dijo una vez que yo era como un gato.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi once said that I was like a cat.

CONTENT: 人に懐かなそうなところが猫なんだそうだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parece que es porque puedo mantenerme distante con los demás.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The fact that I keep my distance from others makes me cat-like, apparently.

CONTENT: 確かに 人に心を許さないところはあると思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sin embargo, hay una parte de mí que no quiere abrirse a la gente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though there is a part of me that doesn't want to open up to people.

CONTENT: でも 安達も似たようなものじゃないか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero creo que Adachi es igual que yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But Adachi's basically the same.

CONTENT: 膝の上で まどろむ安達は　確かに猫のようだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando puso la cabeza en mi regazo, me recordó a un gato.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi dozing off with her head on my lap definitely reminded me of a cat.
What is it?

CONTENT: こっちの方がいいかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think this is better.

CONTENT: そう?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, really?

CONTENT: こっち向いて寝るとしまむらのニオイがするから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si me echo así, puedo olerte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because if I lay down this way, I can smell you.

CONTENT: えっ 私 体臭きつい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?! Wait, do I have bad BO?

CONTENT: そういう意味じゃなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not what I meant.

CONTENT: じゃあ しない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fine, I won't.

CONTENT: しまむらには風情が足りないかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think you lack elegance, Shimamura.

CONTENT: 風情 うーん 風情ねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Elegance... Hm... Elegance, eh?

CONTENT: 今まで言われたことないなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que es la primera vez que me dicen eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't think anyone's told me that before.

CONTENT: ねえ 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say, Adachi.

CONTENT: 午後から一緒に授業受けない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿quieres ir a clase conmigo esta tarde?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wanna actually go to class with me this afternoon?

CONTENT: どうしたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What brought that up?

CONTENT: いや 授業日数とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, es por la asistencia y tal...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you know, attendance and such...

CONTENT: うーん つまり 一緒に2年生になった方が楽しいじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sería más divertido si las dos pasáramos a segundo juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What I'm saying is, it'd be more fun if we both made it as second-years together.

CONTENT: 一緒に...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Together...

CONTENT: たまにはいいかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess it wouldn't hurt once in a while.

CONTENT: よしっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay!

CONTENT: じゃあさ授業終わったら どっか寄ろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces, nos iremos por ahí cuando acaben las clases.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then, hey... Let's go somewhere once classes are over.

CONTENT: 予定 何かある?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you have other plans?

CONTENT: 今日はないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not today...

CONTENT: というか 大体 いつもない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ni hoy ni nunca, la verdad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, I never really do.

CONTENT: そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: 今日の釣果は上々かな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe I'll actually get a bite today.

CONTENT: 学校の中というのは独特な社会として機能していて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El instituto es un mundo en sí mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: School is its very own, unique society,

CONTENT: その空気を外に持ち出されると困惑してしまう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si lo extrapolas a la sociedad, se confunden las cosas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and if you brought that outside, it confused things.

CONTENT: だから 学校の中でずっと生きていければと思う人も中には出てくるのだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy segura de que habrá gente que prefiera vivir en el insti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm sure that some people would just prefer to live out their lives at school.

CONTENT: そんなことはさておいて いい未来を釣りたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aparte de eso, yo quiero un futuro brillante...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That aside, I want to catch a bright future.

CONTENT: そのためには まず釣り糸を垂らさないと始まらない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para conseguirlo, si no tiro la caña, no va a desarrollarse nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And for that to happen, I've got to cast my line, or nothing will begin.

CONTENT: 授業どうだった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How were your classes?

CONTENT: 日本史はいいけど　数学はもうさっぱり分かんなくなってた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Historia ha estado bien, pero estoy muy perdida en mates.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Japanese history was fine, but I definitely don't understand math anymore.

CONTENT: ハハ... 安達よりも授業を受けているはずの私が両方ともさっぱりっていうのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo he ido a más clases que tú y también estoy perdida. Así que qué me vas a contar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've been to more classes than you and yet, neither makes sense to me, so where does that put me?

CONTENT: しまむら何か注目されてたね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La gente te miraba mucho, parecías famosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You seemed to get a lot of attention, Shimamura.

CONTENT: いやいや 安達の方じゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguro que te miraban a ti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, I'm pretty sure you did.

CONTENT: ううん しまむらだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it was you.

CONTENT: やっぱり美人だからかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguramente sea porque eres muy guapa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's probably because you're so pretty.

CONTENT: はあ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: どうしたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's wrong?

CONTENT: 美人なんて言われるのこれが初めてなもので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es la primera vez que alguien me dice que soy guapa...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, this is the first time anyone's ever called me pretty, so...

CONTENT: そう? 彼氏とかには...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿En serio? ¿Tu novio no te lo dice?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really? Your boy... friend doesn't call you that?

CONTENT: できたことないよ そんなの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've never had one.

CONTENT: みんな 見る目がないね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh... I guess everyone must be blind.

CONTENT: えっ?あれ 自転車は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Wait, where's your bike?

CONTENT: 修理に出した
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's out for repairs.

CONTENT: 歩いてでも来るなんてえらいねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, así que has caminado. Bien hecho.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh... So you actually walked to school. Good job.

CONTENT: しまむら 来てるかなと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, es que sabría que estarías aquí...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I thought you'd be here, so...

CONTENT: あっ... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, right...

CONTENT: あめえー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's so sweet!

CONTENT: しまむらは明日の授業出るの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Mañana vas a ir a clase, Shimamura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you going to classes tomorrow, Shimamura?

CONTENT: まあ 三日坊主にならないぐらいは頑張るつもり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos voy a intentar ir más de tres días.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I'm going to at least do my best to go for more than three days.

CONTENT: そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: どうですか? 安達さん一緒に頑張ってみませんか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y tú qué, Adachi? ¿Te parece que nos esforcemos juntas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do you say, Miss Adachi? Why don't we put in a little effort together?

CONTENT: それじゃあ もうちょっとだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess... I can try a little harder.

CONTENT: 一口食べる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Want a bite?

CONTENT: じゃあ あーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure. Ah...

CONTENT: お返し
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right back at you.

CONTENT: 安達?　ああ なるほど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi? Oh, I see.

CONTENT: はい クリーム こういうことでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Toma, con crema. Es lo que querías, ¿verdad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here, there's some cream. This is what you were waiting for, right?

CONTENT: あっ じゃ じゃあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, uh, sure...

CONTENT: 食べたら どこ行く?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where should we go after we eat?

CONTENT: 人といることはほんの少し苦痛を伴う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estar con otra gente es como si me doliera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Being with other people seems to bring a little bit of pain.

CONTENT: 理解できないこと面倒なこと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No entender algo o que algo moleste...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not understanding something. Something being a pain.

CONTENT: 関係のこじれに伴う修復解体への労力
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Intentar arreglar relaciones y esforzarme en encontrar soluciones...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Trying to mend relationships. Putting in effort to find solutions.

CONTENT: だけど そうした負の面の隙間に幸せは転がっている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero... A veces hay algo de felicidad escondida entre tanta negatividad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... Sometimes a bit of happiness is rolling around in between all that negativity.

CONTENT: 子供のときになくした小さなボールを ふと見つけるように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es como cuando de pequeña encontrabas una canica que se te había perdido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just like when you're a kid and you find a tiny ball that you thought you'd lost,

CONTENT: 安達と出会ったことがよりよい未来
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero confiar en que conocer a Adachi
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to believe that the fact that I met Adachi

CONTENT: そのものであると信じたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: va a traerme un futuro mejor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: is going to bring me a brighter future.

CONTENT: えっと...あっ 嫌なら離す!　すぐ離す!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si te incomoda, te suelto ahora mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If it's awkward, I'll let go! Like right away!

CONTENT: というか ビックリした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me incomoda, es que me ha pillado por sorpresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It wasn't awkward. You just startled me.

CONTENT: やめようか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should I not then?

CONTENT: いや いいよ 行こう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's fine. Let's go.

CONTENT: 安達って意外と甘えたがり?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you like being coddled, Adachi?

CONTENT: そんなことない...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No...

私にとっては 別に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I'm not...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...that surprised...

CONTENT: うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shukoh... Shukoh...

CONTENT: こんにちは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello.

CONTENT: あ... ああ うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, uh, hey...

CONTENT: 見かけたので声をかけてみました

CONTENT: 駅前を普通に歩いてんのねそれで

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You really just walk around in front of the station in that...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que es mi traje más elegante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, this is my finest outfit.

CONTENT: あなたの指からステキな甘い香りがしますね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Huelo algo muy dulce en tus dedos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I smell something exquisitely sweet from your fingers.

CONTENT: これは いいですね 何の香りですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, this is quite nice. What is it?

CONTENT: ドーナツのニオイでしょ さっき食べたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguramente huelan a donuts porque acabo de comer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Probably donuts, since I just ate some.

CONTENT: ドーナツ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Donuts?

CONTENT: 何すんの　何となくやると思ったけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué haces? En realidad, me lo esperaba...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you doing? Though I saw that coming...

CONTENT: 私のレーダーに反応しました　そこに ドーナツがありますね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mi radar ha pitado. Ahí dentro hay donuts, ¿verdad?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There was a blip on my radar! There're donuts in there, aren't there?

CONTENT: あるけど 取るな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, but don't grab at it.

CONTENT: そのド... ドーナツを一ついただければ　代わりに宇宙の秘密を一つ教えましょう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si me das uno, revelaré uno de los secretos del universo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you give me one of those d-donuts, I shall reveal one of the secrets of the universe!

CONTENT: はあ? あのね これは妹の!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? This is for my little sister.

CONTENT: ドーナツ食べるヘルメット取る　顔 見える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si quiere comer, se quitará la escafandra y le veré la cara.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If they eat a donut, they'll take off their helmet, and I can see their face.

CONTENT: しょうがない 1個だけね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, fine. You can have one.

CONTENT: えっと じゃあ こっちね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's see... You can have this one.

CONTENT: これが ドーナツですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que esto es un donut.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, so this is a donut.

CONTENT: ヘルメット 外さんのかい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're not taking off your helmet?!

CONTENT: これは いいものですね!甘い甘い　ドーナツ知らんって　それ 何の踊り?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Qué rico! -¡Qué dulce estaba! -¿Nunca habías probado un donut? ¿Qué baile es ese?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, this was nice. You've never heard of donuts before? What kind of dance is that?

CONTENT: もっと甘いものありませんかね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you have any more sweets?

CONTENT: 自分で買え
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Buy some yourself.

CONTENT: お金などありません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have no money.

CONTENT: あんた どうやって生きて...　しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How do you survive? Shimamura.

CONTENT: 自転車 取り行くから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to get my bike. Huh?

CONTENT: 先に じゃあ また明日
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Later. I'll see you tomorrow.

CONTENT: もしかして 何か怒ってた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, was she mad?

CONTENT: 今起きたことを 宇宙の秘密の代わりに教えてあげましょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Prefieres que te diga qué acaba de pasar en lugar de un secreto del universo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Would you like me to tell you what just happened instead of one of the universe's secrets?

CONTENT: 言ってみ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure...

CONTENT: ドーナツをもらえなかったから怒ったのですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Se ha enfadado porque no le has dado un donut!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's mad because she didn't get a donut!

CONTENT: 帰れ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go home.

CONTENT: この自称 未来人が
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have no idea if this self-proclaimed person

CONTENT: 今後の私の人生を大きく変える ...かは分からない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que viene del futuro va a cambiar mucho mi vida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: from the future is going to greatly change my life.

CONTENT: そもそも人生は何があっても変わらない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las cosas no suelen cambiarte la vida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not like things usually change your life.

CONTENT: 未来を誰も知らないのだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nadie sabe qué nos depara el futuro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because no one knows what the future holds.

CONTENT: 変えようがないのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't change it.

CONTENT: はあー やっぱり人付き合いって難しい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Man, relationships are hard...

CONTENT: 分かる 分かる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I totally understand.

CONTENT: 何がだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Understand what?

CONTENT: しまむらは なぜか　私の方が美人だと思っているらしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por alguna razón, Shimamura opina que yo soy más guapa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Apparently, Shimamura thinks I'm prettier for some reason.

CONTENT: それは 大きな誤解といえる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But she is greatly mistaken.

CONTENT: 私からすればしまむらの方が ずっとかわいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo diría que Shimamura es mucho más guapa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'd say that Shimamura is way cuter.

CONTENT: けだるそうな目元つつましやかに動く口
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esa mirada de ensueño, cómo mueve los labios...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her dreamy eyes, the way she modestly moves her lips...

CONTENT: 目がいくのはしまむらの顔ばかり　特に口元
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puedo dejar de mirarle la cara y, sobre todo, sus labios.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My eyes keep looking at her face, especially her lips.

CONTENT: しまむらとキスをする夢を見た
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: He soñado que besaba a Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I had a dream where I kissed Shimamura.

CONTENT: 別に私はそういうアレじゃないのだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero a mí no me van esas cosas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not like I'm into that.

CONTENT: 多分 しまむらと少し仲良くなりたいということの表れで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quizás sea una señal de que quiero hacerme más amiga de Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think I just want to be closer with Shimamura...

CONTENT: だから そういうアレでは 決してない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it's definitely not like that.

CONTENT: キスも大した意味は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ese beso no significa nada profundo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no deep meaning behind that kiss.

CONTENT: ない ない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nope! None!

CONTENT: 絶対にしたくないとまでは言わない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No niego que no vaya a besarla,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not saying I'd never kiss her...

CONTENT: でも 絶対にしたいとも思ってない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero tampoco digo que quiera hacerlo, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I'm not saying I absolutely want to, either?

CONTENT: しまむらを中心に半径5キロ以内に誰もいなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si no hubiera nadie en cinco kilómetros a la redonda,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If there was no one else within a 5-kilometer radius from Shimamura,

CONTENT: その しまむらは深い眠りについていて　今から24時間 絶対に起きないと全知全能の神が保証してくれたら

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and she was in a deep sleep and an all-knowing deity just happened to reassure me that she wasn't going to wake up in the next 24 hours,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: puede que tras 23 horas me aburra y la bese para quitarme el aburrimiento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: maybe I'd get bored after 23 hours and I might kiss her once to relieve some boredom...

CONTENT: あれ? おかしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Wait...

CONTENT: でも 私はそういうアレじゃない　私はしまむらに優先されたいだけだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no me va eso. Solo quiero que Shimamura me tenga más en cuenta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I'm definitely not that. I just want Shimamura to put me first.

CONTENT: しまむらが友達という言葉を聞いて　私を最初に思い浮かべてほしい

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want Shimamura to think of me first when she hears the word \"friend.\"

CONTENT: それぐらいの多少の 独占欲めいたものがあるのは認めている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sé que suena un poco posesivo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know that may sound a bit possessive...

CONTENT: 実際のところしまむらが私をどれくらい友達だと考えているかはずっと気になっている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La verdad es que me pregunto hasta qué punto me considera su amiga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: To be quite honest, I've been wondering how much of a friend Shimamura actually sees me as.

CONTENT: 他の友達と何も変わらないのか　それとも少しは意識してくれているのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Soy como el resto de sus amigas o siente algo más por mí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Am I just like her other friends? Or does she have other feelings for me?

CONTENT: いらっしゃいま... あっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Welcom-

CONTENT: えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: だから恥ずかしいって言った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te dije que me daba vergüenza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I told you it was embarrassing.

CONTENT: いいじゃん 似合ってるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's fine. It suits you.

CONTENT: ふーん 友達かあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, a friend.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really, don't worry about it.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oho... Are you two in the same class?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, come on.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll have tantanmen.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then I'll have...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al parecer, Shimamura no me comprende,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Apparently, Shimamura doesn't really understand me,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She doesn't push me away when I rely on her,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero ella tampoco se apoya en nadie más.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but she doesn't try to rely on anyone herself.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That was how I saw Shimamura.

CONTENT: ちょっと真面目に来たと思ったら これだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya creía que ibas por el buen camino, pero mírate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought you were finally shaping up, and now look at you.

CONTENT: 誰かのマネ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who's that supposed to be?

CONTENT: 担任 今日はどうしたって　私に聞かれても困るよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El profe. Me ha preguntado dónde estabas como si yo lo supiera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our teacher. They were asking me where you were like I'd be able to answer.

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 昨日の安達かわいかったなあと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estaba recordando lo guapa que estabas ayer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was just thinking about how cute you looked yesterday.

CONTENT: し... しまむらも かわいいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, tú también estabas muy guapa...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? B-But you're cute, too, Shimamura...

CONTENT: いや 私 何にもしてないし　また今度 食べに行こうかなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué? Si no me hice nada raro. Creo que voy a volver a comer ahí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? It's not like I did anything. Maybe I'll go there to eat again.

CONTENT: やめて やめてください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't. Please don't.

CONTENT: 冗談 私も家族と一緒に行くのはちょっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era broma. No sé si quiero volver con mi familia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm kidding. I'm not sure if I want to go again with my family...

CONTENT: 何か恥ずかしいよね 家族に...　おっ しまむーらじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En realidad da palo ir con la familia... -Anda, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It is sort of embarrassing when you're with family-

CONTENT: あれ つうか 来てんじゃん　隣いい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Oh, so you did come. Can I sit next to you?

CONTENT: ああ... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh, sure...

CONTENT: えっと その...　...さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... You're... Right?

CONTENT: 安達 安達だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's Adachi! Adachi.

CONTENT: 名前忘れたけどボソボソしゃべればごまかせると思ったろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te olvidas de su nombre y crees que susurrando iba a funcionar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You forgot her name but somehow really thought whispering would work?

CONTENT: で 安達さんえっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, Adachi.

CONTENT: おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good morning.

CONTENT: あっ おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: G-Good morning.

CONTENT: 珍しいじゃん 学食なんて　こういうのも嫌いじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Qué raro veros por aquí. Esto no me disgusta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's rare for you to eat school lunch. I guess I don't hate this.

CONTENT: 2人の騒々しさを伴う雰囲気は悪くない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Their noisiness isn't bad.

CONTENT: 小学校の給食を思い出して少し懐かしかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me recordó a la hora de comer del cole y me dio un poco de nostalgia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It reminded me of lunchtime in grade school and was a bit nostalgic.

CONTENT: だけど しまむらと二人きりに割り込まれたという気持ちも少なからずあって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero también sentía como si me estuvieran robando tiempo con Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it also felt like they were cutting into my time alone with Shimamura.

CONTENT: これは違う という　違和感めいた思いがあるのも事実だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puedo negar que esto no me guste del todo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't deny that I felt that this didn't feel right.

CONTENT: 安達 午後からはどうするの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi, ¿qué vas a hacer esta tarde?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi, what are you going to do about the afternoon?

CONTENT: えっと 授業に出るつもり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A ver... Creo que voy a ir a clase.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... I plan to go to class... I think.

CONTENT: そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: あっ しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura...

CONTENT: 今日 しまむらの家行ってみていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me preguntaba si... podría pasarme hoy por tu casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was wondering if I... ...could go to your house today.

CONTENT: じゃあ こっちだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This way. Okay...

CONTENT: お姉ちゃん おかえりー...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Welcome home, Big... Sis.

CONTENT: お邪魔します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hi...

CONTENT: ただいま あっ 友達ね 昨日の人
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya he vuelto. Ella es mi amiga, la de ayer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks. Oh, this is my friend. From yesterday.

CONTENT: 何か ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry...

CONTENT: あー いいの あいつ人見知りするから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, don't worry. She's a bit shy.

CONTENT: 部屋 1階なんだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu cuarto está en la primera planta. Sí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So your room's on the first floor. Yeah.

CONTENT: その辺 座ってー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can sit wherever.

CONTENT: ふう... で どうしようかね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, what should we do?

CONTENT: あの しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say, Shimamura...

CONTENT: うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm?

CONTENT: 言うな 言うな 言うな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No lo digas, no lo digas, no lo digas...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't say it, don't say it, don't say it...

CONTENT: あの 座ってもいいかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, do you mind if I sit...?

CONTENT: しまむらの足の 間とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like... Between your legs...

CONTENT: 何を言ってんだ 私はこれじゃ 完全に変なヤツ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué he dicho? Voy a parecer una rarita.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What did I just say?! Oh, my God. I'm a complete weirdo.

CONTENT: いいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure.

CONTENT: って いいのかよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, it's okay?!

CONTENT: あれ あれ あれ いいのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, huh? I... It's okay?

CONTENT: これは 夢か? 夢なのか? いいんだな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this a dream? Is it? So it's okay?

CONTENT: しまむらの両足が...うわあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura's legs...

CONTENT: 何してんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you doing?

CONTENT: いや だって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I mean...

CONTENT: 妹が こういう座り方してくるし これって普通じゃないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A mí hermana le gusta sentarse así. ¿No te parece normal?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm? Well, my little sister likes to sit like this. Isn't this normal?

CONTENT: ふ... 普通だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah, sure...

CONTENT: 変だ すごく変だ!鎖骨が痛い!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es muy raro. Me duele la clavícula.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's weird. It's super weird! My clavicle hurts!

CONTENT: 普通 胸が痛いとかあるが私の場合は 骨が痛くなる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A la gente le suele doler el pecho, pero a mí me duelen los huesos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Usually, people feel pain in their chest, but I'm feeling it in my bones.

CONTENT: むきだしにでもなるかのようにピキピキと 骨のきしむ音がして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me duelen tanto los huesos que parece como si se me fueran a salir del cuerpo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My bones start grinding so much that it feels like they're out in the open.

CONTENT: 楽になりたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just want to relax...

CONTENT: いない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't...

CONTENT: そうなんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: そのために何をすればいいのかすぐ分かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Inmediatamente me di cuenta de cómo hacerlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I immediately figured out how to do that.

CONTENT: 《好きっていうか》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I like... you, I think...

CONTENT: 私は何を言おうとしたんだいや 言った? 言ってない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué? ¿Qué he intentado decir? Espera, ¿lo he dicho?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, what?! What did I just try to say? Did I say it? Wait, did I?!

CONTENT: 《しまむらのこと好き みたいな》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think... I like you, Shimamura.

CONTENT: こりゃダメだ いけない アホか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya está, la he liado. Soy una idiota.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nope, I'm done for. I can't... I'm an idiot.

CONTENT: これは これは これは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is... This is... This is...

CONTENT: 《す... 好きなのかな 多分さ ひょっとしたらの話》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que me gustas y quizás...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I think I like you... Possibly, maybe...

CONTENT: 《好き? のようなさ》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You know, like... really like...

CONTENT: 大バカのやることだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm a complete moron...

CONTENT: ええと 大丈夫?　呼吸してる?顔真っ赤だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Estás bien? ¿Estás respirando bien? Tienes la cara colorada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... You okay? Are you breathing? Your face is like bright red...

CONTENT: なんだばしゃああー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the efffffff...

CONTENT: なんだばしゃああー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the efffffff?!

CONTENT: イタッ イタタ...　日が沈んで 昇ってきても　私に明日は来るのだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Ay, ay, ay! Me duele el cuello. -Aunque el sol se ponga y vuelva a salir Episodio 2: La pregunta de Adachi ¿llegará un mañana para mí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ow! Ow, ow... My neck hurts. It hurts. Even if the sun were to set and rise again, would tomorrow even come for me?
